trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_SEQ_00<tab>Thancred has a task for you.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_00<tab>Search for enthralled civilians in the Derelicts.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_01<tab>Administer dream powder to Thoarich.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_02<tab>Search for enthralled civilians in the Understory.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_03<tab>Administer dream powder to the amiable maiden.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_04<tab>Search for enthralled civilians in the Canopy.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_05<tab>Administer dream powder to the free citizen.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Ryne.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>My thanks again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We will seek out the wounded and render what aid we can.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>Some folk managed to escape the mind control but were caught in the chaos. We'll make sure they receive treatment as well.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_010<tab>It's all right. You're safe now.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_PATIENT03631_000_015<tab><groan> What...what happened?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_URIANGER_000_020<tab>Bereft of leadership, the soldiers have lost the will to fight. They pose no threat to us.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>So this was how the citizens lived─the Eulmoran dream. They are in for quite a rude awakening.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THANCRED_000_030<tab>So, here is some dream powder.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THANCRED_000_031<tab>We're administering it to the enthralled to keep them calm until they can receive proper attention. I would appreciate it if you could assist with this task.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THANCRED_000_032<tab>Now, those affected are scattered all over the city. I suggest starting your search at the Derelicts and working your way up.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THANCRED_000_033<tab>When you are done, be sure to let Ryne know.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THOARICH_000_040<tab>O Lord Vauthry... You are...my daily meol...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THOARICH_000_050<tab><snore> <snore>
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_THOARICH_000_060<tab>Mmmmmm...meol... <slurp>
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_065<tab><gasp> I know you!
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_LADY03287_000_070<tab>Ahhh...it hurts... Please, Lord Vauthry...take away the pain...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_071<tab>You're the kind soul who saved me from falling to my death!
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_072<tab>M-My mistress, she's been injured! Please help her, I beg you!
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_075<tab>Please, is there nothing you can do for her?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_080<tab>Wh-What is this?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_081<tab>She's...sleeping. A medicine to help her rest while she awaits treatment, you say?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_082<tab>Oh, thank you so much! When she began acting strangely, I didn't know what to do...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_LADY03287_000_090<tab>Zzzzzz...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_EMPLOYEE03287_000_095<tab>I won't leave my mistress's side.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_GENTLEMAN03289_000_100<tab>Must stop...trespassers... Sullying...our paradise...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_GENTLEMAN03289_000_110<tab><snort> Where did you fly to...my sweet canary...?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_GENTLEMAN03289_000_120<tab>Please don't leave me... Zzzzzz...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_130<tab>Oh, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_131<tab>I've just finished aiding this man. Now, for the next one...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_132<tab>More out in the Derelicts and below, you say? So many of them...
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_133<tab>But Minfilia entrusted this power to me. I won't rest until I've helped everyone.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_A1_000_001<tab>I can bring the enthralled to you.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_A1_000_002<tab>I'll go and see to the wounded.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_134<tab>Oh, that would certainly make it easier for me to work.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_135<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'll do my best to keep pace.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_136<tab>I'm sure Alphinaud and Alisaie would appreciate the help.
TEXT_LUCKME103_03632_RYNE_000_137<tab>And should you find other enthralled civilians, please see that they are brought to me.
